title: Part One: Christmas non-Bastard: The Tupamaros of Uruguay
itunes:title: Part One: Christmas non-Bastard: The Tupamaros of Uruguay
description:
Robert is joined by Margaret Killjoy to discuss José Alberto "Pepe" Mujica Cordano.
